cats.name: Battle Royale
cats.desc: Last man (or squad) standing in a fight to victory.

cats.name: Class Based
cats.desc: Games that utilize classes (ie; sniper, soldier, heavy, medic)

cats.name: Moba
cats.desc: Multiplayer Online Battle Arena. Choose your hero, and fight your way to victory down your chosen lane.

cats.name: Party
cats.desc: Table-top group games (ie; uno, monopoly, quiplash)

cats.name: Racing
cats.desc: Racing game; should be kinda obvious.

cats.name: RTS
cats.desc: Real-Time Strategy game. (ie; Supreme Commander, StarCraft, Planetary Annihilation)

cats.name: Sandbox
cats.desc: Typically open world, games that permit the player to roam about and complete tasks; includes world alteration and crafting.

cats.name: Survival
cats.desc: Survival game; gotta survive, grow food, fend off zombies, that sort of thing.

cats.name: FPS
cats.desc: First person shooter! (This is a general division, if it fits under Battle Royale, put it under that instead.)

cats.name: Religious Studies
cats.desc: Anything related to the study of the Bible or the Faith, or even just religion in general.
